translation.icon-upload-info: You are about to upload a custom icon. For the best experience, upload icons with a 5:4 ratio.
translation.font-offset-info: If the text in the canvas do not line up correctly, adjustments may be necessary.
translation.sprites-upload-info: You are uploading a custom sprite. For best experience, upload sprites that are 512x1024 or 1024x1024 in size.
translation.delete-layer-warn: This is the only layer and cannot be deleted. Use the 'Hidden' option instead.
translation.clear-warn:
You are about to clear the canvas! Any progress will be lost. 
Pressing 'OK' will proceed the action.
